name: Dr. Steve Klabnik
title: Rust Core Team Member
bio: Core team member of the Rust programming language and co-author of 'The Rust Programming Language' book. Passionate about making Rust accessible to developers worldwide.
talk: The Future of Systems Programming with Rust

name: Ashley Williams
title: Former Executive Director
bio: Former Executive Director of the Rust Foundation and advocate for diversity in tech. Expert in building inclusive developer communities and open source governance.
talk: Building Inclusive Developer Communities in Africa

name: Prof. Nana Kwame
title: Professor of Computer Science
bio: Leading researcher in distributed systems and blockchain technology. Pioneer in bringing Rust education to African universities and research institutions.
talk: Rust in African Academia: Opportunities and Challenges

name: Fatima Aliyu
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: Senior software engineer at Andela with expertise in building scalable backend systems. Active contributor to Rust open source projects and mentor to African developers.
talk: Building High-Performance APIs with Rust and Actix

name: Dr. Jean-Baptiste
title: Research Scientist
company: Ministry of Post and Telecommunications, Cameroon
bio: Research scientist at the Ministry of Post and Telecommunications of Cameroon. Leading government initiatives for digital transformation and technology adoption in Cameroon.
talk: Government Support for Rust Adoption in Cameroon

name: Aisha Mohammed
title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Full stack developer specializing in web applications and mobile development. Co-founder of Rust Nigeria community and advocate for women in tech across Africa.
talk: Rust and WebAssembly: Building Fast Web Applications
